reviewText:
Terrific duo of fun films that stress romance.  Kate & Leopold is a gem with memorable scenes and a message about true love and finding happiness in life.  Meg Ryan is her usual focused businesswoman.  But Hugh Jackman steals the show.  He's a real hunk.
Serendipity is fun, but not as deep or entertaining as Kate & Leopold.  But at the price and linked to K&L, it's worth having.  Premise in this film is somewhat goofy, but John Cusak makes it work.
Two for the price of one! What an amazing deal! It's in great condition and I love it!!!
This is a sweet movie and we need more like them.  I put this in the same genre as Sleepless in Seattle or While you were sleeping.

everything was shipped promptly and my family has watched the movies several times already.  First time I even thought to buy something other than books through Amazon - I'll definitely do this again!
The movie is funny, romantic, and interesting, because it goes back to the days of the building of the brooklyn bridge.
Obviously, both titles indicate 'chick flick'. They are romantic, somewhat comical, somewhat serious and highly entertaining. So make the popcorn, pop in either movie, sit back, relax and enjoy!
These two have always been my favorite two movies, and being able to collect both of them at the same time was just fantastic!
Love anything with Meg Ryan in it and along comes Leopold  only if we could turn back the time what a dream awesome movie
Nothing like a good Rom Com these 2 films are two of the best. Wanted them for my film library for quite a while. Satisfaction!
John Cusack is a great actor in this double feature
Two great movies in one buy, how can you go wrong!  I love it!!

Two of my favorite movies updated to be in high definition (as best as they can for movies of this age) I highly recommend! TVs are being made with extreme picture viewing quality these days and DVDs just don't cut it anymore. And for the price?? This is a steal!

Serendipity is one of my favorite rom-com's I just love the characters and how they find each other, it is very romantic. I have never seen Kate and Leopold so I will reserve my opinion until I watch it.

My son enjoys all genres of movies, he does watch chick flicks, I told him that will make him very popular with the girls/ladies LOL. Anyway these are two of his favorites so I could not beat the price for the two of them together. I am happy with my purchase.

great love story

I was pleasantly surprised by this movie. All the elements of a good story and dialogue were there, along with fine acting, but what blew me away and led me to pen this review was Hugh Jackman's character. Jackman can really act. I mean, he is truly a great actor when you consider the various roles he's done over the years. This character, Leopold, he just nails. And it is a tough character to nail! I mean, I think of some very good actors like Tom Hanks or many others and they could not have pulled off Leopold anywhere near as well as Jackman.
I enjoyed this movie and watch it with joy.

This is our second purchase of the same two films as our original ones began to corrupt.  Just watched Serendipity again this evening with the family.  It's a family classic.  There is one particularly racy part that we always fast-forward through but we enjoy this every time.

Kate & Leopold is another enjoyable film bringing the hero, Hugh Jackman, from the past into the future.  The contrast of the past culture with the current makes for a great dynamic.  Our family has to watch these two films at least annually since it first came out.

When finally, I did order, I found a double movie available to me, for about the same price, I was willing to pay.

My order arrived sooner than the time I allowed.  (Which is a plus.)
And the second movie "Serendipity", was an excellent movie, just the kind my "99 year", young mother enjoys...and me too!
Thanks for the chance to express my gratitude.  Irene

She watches DVDs in the car when we drive since we live over an hour from her house.  So a round trip is a movie.  She loves this.

I was originally seeking just Serendipity, which is a wonderful movie about the how much your life is impacted by you and by natural occurances (fate).  I am a John Cusack fan and this movie does not diminish his acting ability at all, but rather serves as another opportunity for him to show his scope.  This movie is full of humor and touching moments and an all around good film.  Kate & Leopold is a nice tale in itself about how the past and present can be connected.  I haven't seen it as much, but it's worth a viewing.
I love this movie a good romance kinda movie  and also is funny .I love this move .good even for kids to watch no bad parts in it .

I bought this DVD because I was looking to purchase Serendipity. I love that movie and it was cheaper to buy it with another movie attached to it. The Kate & Leopold movie was just gravy and it was a cute movie that my wife actually enjoyed. Serendipity is a cute love story.
Great fantasy, love  story that is well written, perfectly cast with great actors who were realistic, while being  hilariously funny!!!  Everyone will LOVE this one!!

These two movies went with my Ex when he moved out.. no he did not want them, they are chick flicks, but he was being HIM.  I loved both of these movies and I do watch good movies over and over and over.. I Have missed them for 5 yrs.. then decided to find Kate & Leopold on Amazon.. to my delight they had BOTH in one purchase.. yes they are both awesome and not damaged upon delivery..  I am very very pleased and will definitely order more from Amazon in the future.  SO happy now.

You know how you just get hooked on certain shows; it is funny seeing Hugh Jackman in a romance movie but he was astounding! And how can you go wrong with Meg Ryan. Great movie with outstanding support cast members (Liev Schreiber and Brekin Meyer), clever show, underrated.

Serendipity with John Cusack and Kate Beckinsale is also wonderful, just a notch below Kate and Leopold). I just adore Kate's English accent and the movie also has outstanding support cast members (Jeremy Piven and John Corbett).. This, along with High Fidelity, are Cusack's best movies.

Two great shows worthy of buying on blu-ray!
Fun, entertaining and really enjoyed both movies.  I loved all their acting.  Good, fun stories to watch by myself or with my friends.
Good product and rec'd. within the promised time.  I love these movies...I am replacing my VHS version with this one.
FUNNY AND TOUCHING ROMANCE MOVIES. MEG RYAN IS ALWAYS GREAT IN HER ROMANCE MOVIES. I ENJOY WATCHING FEEL GOOD MOVIES AND THAT'S WHAT THEY ARE. :)

I caught the end of Kate and Leopold on HBO and as often is the case it didn't have another showing scheduled. I love Kate & Leopold, it's a real chick-flick. Serendipity is also a great movie but the language takes away from the movie.

I can't say how happy I was to find two of my favorite movies in one packaged deal! I had tried over the Christmas holidays to watch Serendipity on Amazon, Hulu or Netflix and was shocked to find that NONE of them had the movie available for streaming! So, this two for one was the ticket. And who doesn't love Hugh Jackman? Fast and safe shipment. Thanks!

When I first saw the Director's Cut of "Kate and Leopold," I was spellbound.  Suddenly, pieces seemed to fit together in a way that provided a more seamless storyline.  The theatrical version left so much out that these same pieces were left dangling.  More is revealed about Meg Ryan's character that makes you understand her more, and the connection between the Duke and Stuart is more intriguing.

"Serendipity" is a movie for romantics.  I love this movie.  There are some seemingly far-fetched ideas in here that actually aren't.

Fun easy to watch Movies,  Chick Flicks, I like them, My husband and kids like them too.  My husband saw one of them on HBO and said "just watched part of a movie I know you will like", and he described Serendipity.  he knows me hahah

I was a little hesitant about buying a use movie over the internet, but I gave it a shoot.  The movie is was in excellent condition and the company delivered it fast.  All in all it was a wonderful first experience.  I will definitely use them again.
I purchased this product to replace an old video tape. The price was great and the product arrived quick and good shape.

One can only guess these 2 romantic comedies are being packaged together because both rank pretty high on the 'leads who have no onscreen chemistry in a romantic comedy' list. Both have relatively good stories, pretty good direction (Serendipity in particular is quite creative), solid (if a little cliched) performances and lots of studio $$$ behind them, but both fall flat from an utter lack of chemistry. I'm only reviewing this duo because it popped up as the highest ranked romantic comedy on Amazon today- and both are among a handful of movies I have seen during which I thought "these leads really seem to dislike each other".

Kate & Leopold and Serendipity are in regular circulation on the pay TV channels. If you're in the mood for a great romantic comedy, buy 'Holiday', 'It Happened One Night', 'Cousin, Cousine', 'Sense and Sensibility' or anything with Hepburn and Tracy.
What can I say. It is a great movie fantasy and I love to watch it when there is nothing else on cable to watchKate & Leopold, and on my cable, that is often. (LOL)

Purchased this set for "Serendipity" but also enjoyed "Kate and Leopold"  Very good deal for these two romantic movies and the picture/sound quality is excellent. If one shops around, they can find a great deal on this set. So why purchase just one DVD when you can get a bonus?

I call it Mind Candy and for a good reason.  You don't have to overthink it, you don't have to worry about plot twists.  You see it for what it is: an escape from reality.  The men are easy to look at, funny and smart.  The women are people you'd like to know - not someone who would completely overshadow you.  These are feel-good movies.  There's nothing wrong with that.
Two very different love stories.
